  • Class
    Description
    Game<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll>
    A game of the Royal Game of Ur.
    GameBuilder
    A builder to help in the creation of custom games of the Royal Game of Ur.
    GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<R extends Roll,SELF extends GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<R,SELF>>
    A builder for constructing games that follow the standard rules.
    GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder
    A builder for constructing games that follow the standard rules, with dice that produce standard rolls of type Roll.
    GameBuilder.StandardWithDiceGameBuilder<R extends Roll>
    A builder for constructing games that follow the standard rules, with dice that produce non-standard types of rolls.
    RGUStatistics
    This file intends to hold tests that can be performed to different sets of game rules and paths to compare them.
